# Files to Add to .gitignore

- `.Rproj.user` — RStudio project metadata, not needed in repo
- `.Rhistory` — command history, personal and local
- `.RData` — workspace image, not needed in repo
- `.Ruserdata` — RStudio user data, local
- `memoise_cache/` — runtime cache files for memoise, not needed in repo
- `data/` — downloaded parquet data files, auto-generated by app
